Traits.Name: Scuttling Presence
Traits.Content: Claws on Tile has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made in dim light or darkness.

Traits.Name: Natural Camouflage
Traits.Content: Claws on Tile can blend into tile surfaces, making it difficult for enemies to detect it. It gains a +2 bonus to AC against ranged attacks when in contact with tile.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Claws on Tile makes two attacks: one with its Talon Slash and one with its Grasp of Shadows.

Actions.Name: Talon Slash
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have its speed halved until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Grasp of Shadows
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 34 (4d10 + 6) necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Scuttling Surge (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: Claws on Tile scuttles forward in a 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, the target also becomes prone as Claws on Tile scuttles past.

Actions.Name: Grappling Talons
Actions.Content: Claws on Tile makes one Talon Slash attack against a Medium or smaller target that is frightened due to the Grasp of Shadows action. If the attack hits, the target suffers a new condition: it becomes grappled and has disadvantage on attack rolls while grappling. The grappled target takes 21 (6d6) slashing damage at the start of each of Claws on Tile's turns. Claws on Tile can only have one target grappled at a time. If the grappling target inflicts 30 damage or more on a single turn, Claws on Tile must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or the grapple ends. If Claws on Tile dies, the grapple also ends.
